name: Clip Through The Walls
description:
In this game, you have to fly through the walls to reach the end of each level. Well, actually you won't be so much as flying as you are pushed by dozens of objects that you jump on automatically. It just looks like you're flying. Don't hit the red barriers!

Controls: A and D keys or Arrow keys to move left to right

SPACE for flying

ESC to pause game

Contains 5 levels

Engine: Unity

Music: Roland FP-30 and Bosca Ceoil

"Art": Gimp2.0
